title: Cupids vvhirligig As it hath bene sundry times acted by the Children of the Kings Majesties Reuels.
author: Sharpham, Edward, 1576-1608.
publisher: Imprinted by E. Allde, and are to bee solde by Arthur Iohnson, at the signe of the white Horse, nere the great north doore of Saint Paules Church,
notes: Dedication signed: E:S, i.e. Edward Sharpham.
Based in part on day 7, novel 6 of: Boccaccio, Giovanni. Decamerone.
Variant: lacks words "As it hath .. Reuels." on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
